metadata.title: CVE-2024-35937 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:wifi: cfg80211: check A-MSDU format more carefullyIf it looks like there's another subframe in the A-MSDUbut the header isn't fully there, we can end up readingdata out of bounds, only to discard later. Make this abit more careful and check if the subframe header caneven be present.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
